tooltip: Select Mipha Dorephan as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Mipha focuses on improving units through Silver upgrades.
Allows you to summon Princess Mipha, a healing hero who attacks with her trident.
Fast moving defensive Spearman unit that deals more damage to creatures.
Total cost of all Silver related Techs (Except for Silver Shields) are reduced by 10%
Conscripts, Silverscale Slashers, and Marshals magic and non-magic armor increased.
